= git help =
Getting help is very easy in git.

Offline resources:
| command             | commentary       |
|---------------------|------------------|
| `git help <verb>`   |                  |
| `git <verb> --help` | git manual entry |
| `man git-<verb>`    |                  |
| `git <verb> -h`     | help in terminal |

<verb> is sth like config, add, etc.
